ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: i was just basing that on debuffing myself.  it used to take 2 pulses per buff on myself, but last time i tried it each buff came off with one pulse, so dunno
ygData.messageBody:
i was just basing that on debuffing myself. it used to take 2 pulses per
buff on myself, but last time i tried it each buff came off with one pulse,
so dunno if they changed it or what. we usually have a caster designated as
dispeller, and he calls off when he is done so people can snare, dot, slow,
etc.

Shada


> to me it usually seems that the only way you know if you've
> disenchanted something
> is if the damage shield goes away. only problem with that is
> you don't know what
> other buffs the mob has stacked on itself before the damage
> shield. so i think what is
> happening is that you are dispelling something every time,
> but maybe not the damage
> shield, but since you get no message, you don't know that you
> are. also note that if
> your casters start dropping dots and snares on the mob before
> you hit the damage shield
> you will essentially be dispelling those instead of the damage shield.
